example.name: raining
example.text: [*-3] Standing in the shelter of the tent -- a rejected hospital tent on which the rain now dripped [*T*-1] , [*-2] no longer drumming -- Adam watched his own hands touch the objects on the improvised counter of boards laid [*] across two beer barrels .

predicate.note: Frames file for 'drum' based on sentences in the financial subcorpus. No comparison.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Illinois , for instance , currently has under investigation 10 of the 30 companies drumming up funds for charities soliciting there .
